Hello

(Not a "real" nihonto quest , but i try anyway.)

I bought this pieces from a guy that bought this at EBAY for a couple of years ago, he paid alot for it, he didnt notice that it had a "wooden" blade in it......he thought that it was a complete sword....but anyway i bought it from him for a couple of $ now.

My question is, what are the "marking" on the top of the Tsuka?? and all of the parts has the same "sign" on them, can someone translate them?, and WHY are they sign??? On my other Gunto mountings there is no signs on any of the kosihrae parts.

(i tried to fill in the signs on one of the photos)

http://photobucket.com/albums/b196/swedeman/mounting/



Best Regards

Patrik
